name: Fixing the Shadows
description:
The new album from songwriter Grant Campbell, released 15th April, featuring twelve brand new tracks and comes in CD digipak format.

'Album of the Week' - The Iain Anderson Show BBC Radio Scotland

1 Halfway to Nowhere
2 Undone
3 Annie
4 Morning Crown
5 Fate of History
6 Darkness
7 The Best of Me
8 Prelude: Tragic Stories
9 Tightrope
10 Tragic Stories
11 Where I Belong
12 Sweet Remembrance

Produced by Grant Campbell & Iain Hutchison
Recorded at Glo-Worm Studios, Glasgow
Mastered by Grammy Award winner Brad Blackwood at Euphonic Masters

Format: CD (Digipak)

name: Expecting Great Things
description:
Released in 2009.

‘Grant Campbell is an underground treasure, and it is vital that you grab this record and become almost at one with yourself again’
- For Folks Sake

‘Grant Campbell’s intimate third album pushes his haunting vocal to the fore’ 4/5
-  The Skinny

1 Expecting Great Things
2. Dead Reckoning	
3. Eternal Bliss	
4. Holding Ground	
5. The Mile We're On	
6. Open for Change	
7. Twelve Days	
8. Shooting Halos	
9. Ordinary Man	
10. In These Loving Arms

Written, recorded & produced by Grant Campbell

Format: CD (Digipak)

name: Beyond Below
description:
Second album from Scottish singer-songwriter Grant Campbell.

‘His voice remains as distinctive and evocative as ever’
- The Sunday Times

’Fourteen songs each possessing the power to halt any listener unwittingly in their tracks and leave them staring pensively into the middle distance’
- The List

1 Bowery Beat
2 Rolling In The Tide	
3 Red River
4 Careless Words		
5 Fire On The Edge Of The Town
6 Lila	
7 Annabelle
8 Fuel The Fire
9 Beyond Below	
10 Starting Line
11 Forlorn
12 Lowlands
13 Lila (Rose Reprise)
14 Before We Start To Forget

Format: CD (Jewel Case with O-Card sleeve)

name: A Brief History of Things to Come
description:
A brief compilation of songs from Grant Campbell's first three albums.

1. Restless Blues (Postcards from Nowhere) 
2. Rebel Soul (Postcards from Nowhere) 
3. Fire on the Edge of Town (Beyond Below) 
4. Forlorn (Beyond Below) 
5. Starting Line (Beyond Below) 
6. Careless Words (Beyond Below) 
7. The Mile We're On (Expecting Great Things) 
8. Expecting Great Things (Expecting Great Things)

Format: CD (Digipak)

name: Postcards from Nowhere
description:
Debut album released in 2005. Currently out of print.

‘Slow, simple, unadorned and powerful’ 
- Sunday Times 'Album of the Week'

Available as digital download:
www.grantcampbell.bandcamp.com
